Installation

Requirements

To download Pre-Fortress 2, you must have:

  • Source SDK Base 2013 Multiplayer
  • A git program

Installation and Updating

TortoiseGit

  • Get and install TortoiseGit
  • Go to your sourcemods folder (folder location: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps)
  • Right click and select Git Clone...
  • Set the URL to https://gitlab.com/CryptoGibus/pf2.git and make sure the directory is pf2
  • Click OK and wait until it finishes downloading
  • You're done! Now close and re-open Steam again to see the game inside your library
